# devenv v2025.12.24

## devenv

- Add dotnet tools: dotnet-ef, Microsoft.Web.LibraryManager.Cli, Microsoft.dotnet-scaffold
- Add MAUI workload installation
- Add yahyabatulu.vscode-markdown-alert VS Code extension
- Add new MSBuild Linter to eslint.config.ts. Fix tabs/spaces/indent_size chaos.
  - `slnx`
  - `props`
  - `targets`
  - `csproj`
  - `csproj.user`
  - `pubxml`
  - `nuspec`
  - `pkgproj`
- Add GNOME folder icon support in VS Code. Press F1 and run "Icons: Apply Icons Customization" command.
![GNOME folder icons](/assets/GNOME/GNOME.png)
- Add antaalt.shader-validator VS Code extensions for GLSL syntax checking and formatting, and enable it in settings.
- Replace "rm" with "trash" command for safer file deletion.
- Update bash setup script to include trash-cli installation instructions.
- Change font to Cascadia Code PL.
- Remove dotnet 8 from default installation
- Increase VS Code zoom level to 0.5
- Create color scheme for .screenrc
- Upgrade Node.js to v24.12.0 LTS
- Update several npmjs packages

## @blazor/assets

- Update Bootstrap to v5.3.8
- Update @microsoft/dotnet-js-interop to "^10.0.0"
- Add animation effects
